name: A fig leaf
data: It has awesome armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'hammer'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'barbs'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'quick thrusts'.
It gives awesome bonus to the skill 'flow of life'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'thrust'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'desensitization'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'arrow handling'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'double thrust'.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'zombie chomp'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'weapon skill 1h polearm'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'hide the sausage'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'anatomy'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives awesome bonus to the skill 'artistic license'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'thrusting polearms'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'triple thrust'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'assemble bones'.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'primal scream'.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'desecrate corpse'.
It gives awesome bonus to the skill 'mastery of coating'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'ambush'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'weapon skill 2h polearm'.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'extract bodypart'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'make disguise wax'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'uranus lore'.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'scattershot'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'wear makeup'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'wandmaking'.
